title: Q&A With Melissa Planning, Preserving & Troubleshotting
itunes:title: Q&A With Melissa Planning, Preserving & Troubleshotting
description: Today’s podcast is a fun one as I’m answering YOUR questions! We’re covering topics from root cellaring (and tips if you don’t have a root cellar), stocking up on food, what I use for makeup and skincare, my bucket list for homesteading, overwintering strawberries, things I need to increase for a year of food for my own family, and so much more! For more information, links and shownotes visit melissaknorris.com/316.
